Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his alter ego, Duke O'Dowd, setting the stage with an underwater threat and transitioning to a land-based chase and confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Taxi Fare
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Human Meteor on the comic cover, followed by Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront and initial suspicion of being followed.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Rooftop Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor to confront the G-Men, leading to a rooftop fight with 'cop shooters'.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Conspiracy and Underwater Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the conspiracy involving a 'Jap sub' and a yacht, leading to Human Meteor and Toby's investigation, culminating in underwater action and conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Holden reveals the 'Jap sub' conspiracy to Human Meteor in the hospital, leading to Duke and Toby devising a plan to infiltrate the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Toby sneaks aboard the yacht, but is quickly discovered, while Pete on the yacht uncovers a depth chart with marked locations.

sub_scenes.title: Toby Overboard and Duke's Descent
sub_scenes.description: Toby is thrown overboard, Duke senses trouble and transforms, diving underwater to investigate the yacht's secrets.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Submarine Encounter and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor discovers the sunken submarine, encounters hostile divers, and engages in an underwater fight as the submarine crew prepares torpedoes.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Intervention and Yacht Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: Namor intervenes, attacking the submarine and then the yacht, creating chaos and leading to Duke's return to the yacht to investigate Peter's cabin.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Assault
sub_scenes.description: Namor targets and attacks the submarine, then shifts his focus to the yacht, causing damage and casualties.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

sub_scenes.title: Duke Returns to Yacht and Depth Map Search
sub_scenes.description: Duke escapes underwater and arrives at the yacht, learning about Peter's death and initiating a search for the depth map in Peter's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Depth Map Revelation and Speedboat Chase
sub_scenes.description: The depth map reveals Peter's treachery, leading to a speedboat chase, and transitioning towards a hospital visit and return home.

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Domestic Interlude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc provides a brief respite, showing Duke visiting Holden in the hospital and returning home, concluding the immediate action with a domestic scene.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Home Return
sub_scenes.description: Duke visits Holden in the hospital, then returns home in the evening, concluding the day's events with a familial scene.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads and boys discovering a conspiracy at a bus company garage, leading to danger and marine intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads in action, followed by two boys observing an ambulance arriving at a house, leading to their discovery of a dropped wallet.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a bus company garage, where they observe suspicious activities and encounter danger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised
Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Deadly Plan Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, while Major Bronson reveals a deadly plan to eliminate them, leading to a garage uprising and violent intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Marine Barracks Alert
sub_scenes.description: Boys decide to seek help, leading Chuck to the Marine Sergeant, while Skip discovers a secret office revealing sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Intervention and Victory over Nazi Spies
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive and engage in a fight against the 'Nazi rats', leading to victory and the Major's injury but eventual recovery, concluding the garage conspiracy plot.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Rosita Kidnapping Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry, their mission against 'Hitler tools' in South America, and their entanglement in the mystery of Rosita's kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and South American Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in a desert setting, followed by their discovery in a South American town and initial confrontation by soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Americans are detained and interrogated by South American officers, who reveal Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre and suspect the Americans' involvement.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre and Mama's Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: A new scene introduces El Tigre through whispers, followed by a forced car ride for two men, leading to a surprising encounter with 'Mama' who believes they are helping rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and El Tigre's Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Planning to approach El Tigre's hideout, leading to infiltration, a stage dollar diversion, and the dramatic reveal of El Tigre himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Conflicting Accounts
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation tactics including garbage bin confinement and threats, conflicting with El Tigre's denial of kidnapping and accusation of Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Hotel Assault
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's actual captors as Axis agents leads to El Tigre's rescue mission, alongside a separate hotel infiltration and various combat encounters.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Citadel Escape and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Simultaneous actions of escaping to a citadel and utilizing gymnastics for entry, culminating in Rosita being found and rescued amid ongoing fights.

sub_scenes.title: Dominance, Machine Gun Threat, and Government Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Various fight scenes showcasing dominance and violent actions, including a machine gun threat and a government intervention to resolve the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, engaged in combat and a mission related to a captain's son and stolen sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is in jungle combat, followed by military reporting about a 'grave matter' involving him and Captain Lawton, and a high-ranking officer's reaction to disobeyed orders.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog arrives in the jungle, senses danger, and is ambushed and captured by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity, Torture, and Dolan's Deal
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and brought before Grauer, captives are tortured, and Dolan seemingly makes a deal to save himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Justification and Vengeance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, recalls Sam's fiery death in a flashback, and sets native huts ablaze, vowing revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight, Chief's Death, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan ambushes natives, leading to the chief's accidental death, followed by the natives' homage and alliance with Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Captain contemplates surrender, finds his son fighting, and later disciplines Dolan with a spanking for disobeying orders, despite acknowledging Dolan's good deed.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigate Burgess Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, assigned to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through police inquiries, hospital visits, and a confrontation with a dangerous racketeer.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Threat and News Office Assignment
sub_scenes.description: A city street confrontation sets the stage for the Twinkle Twins' story, followed by their assignment in the news office to investigate the Burgess murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: Evidence and Police Station Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Evidence points towards Tom Reilly as the suspect, but the twins investigate further, inquiring about Guy Reilly at the police station and learning about Miss Reilly's illness.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Miss Reilly's Condition
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane journey to the hospital, gain access to Miss Reilly, and discover her serious blood disease and the need for a rare blood type from Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl
Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion

sub_scenes.title: Candy Store Call and Farnacci Connection
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane leave the hospital, call Elijah from a candy store, and receive instructions to investigate connections between Farnacci and other figures.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown

sub_scenes.title: Radio Broadcast and Irish Section Search for Reilly
sub_scenes.description: A radio broadcast reveals Farnacci's gang and the banker's threat, leading Dan and Diane to search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section
Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and Taxi Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Mrs. Murphy reveals Tom Reilly's sacrifice for his daughter, but as they leave, a taxi ambush occurs, making Dan a witness to the shooting.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice
Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Street Pursuit, Brawl, and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Dan pursues the shooters with Diane's help and the Irish neighborhood's blockade, leading to a street brawl and eventual police intervention and arrests.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath and Blood Transfusion Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the street brawl with injured transported to hospital, leading to a community blood drive and successful blood transfusion for Tom Reilly, resolving his medical crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Lassie's Birthday
sub_scenes.description: Public outcry and police action lead to Farnacci's arrest, and the story concludes with a birthday party celebrating Lassie Reilly's recovery, hinting at future adventures for the Twinkle Twins.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
